InteractionSummary.name: InteractionSummary
InteractionSummary.description: Represents the summary of an interaction, including confidentiality information.

AccountId.description: The ID of the account related to the customer who attended the client interaction.

ConfidentialityType.description: Specifies the level of confidentiality of the information that's recorded in this interaction summary.

InteractionId.description: The client interaction related to the interaction summary.

InteractionPurpose.description: Specifies the purpose of the client interaction.

LastReferencedDate.description: The timestamp for when the current user last viewed a record related to this record.

LastViewedDate.description: The timestamp for when the current user last viewed this record. If this value is null, itâ€™s possible that this record was referenced (LastReferencedDate) and not viewed.

MeetingNotes.description: The detailed record of what transpired during the client interaction.

Name.description: The title of the interaction summary, capturing the summary of the interaction.

NextSteps.description: The next steps that were decided during the interaction.

Offering.description: The offerings that were discussed in the client interaction.

OwnerId.description: The ID of the record owner.

PartnerAccountId.description: The ID of the account related to the partner who attended the client interaction.

RelatedRecordId.description: The name of the record such as an opportunity associated with a client interaction.

Status.description: Specifies the status of the interaction summary.
